snippet: In a book that is both a style guide and a memoir, Stacy London, the host of the show “What Not to Wear,” describes her path to becoming a TV fashion guru for the masses.
abstract: Stacy London, fashion stylist and host of show What Not to Wear, releases book The Truth About Style, which describes her path to becoming a TV fashion guru for the masses.
lead_paragraph: In a book that is both a style guide and a memoir, Stacy London, the host of the show “What Not to Wear,” describes her path to becoming a TV fashion guru for the masses.

headline.seo: Stacy London, of ‘What Not to Wear,’ Has a New Book
headline.main: Beating the Frumpiness Out of You, but Gently
headline.print_headline: Beating the Frumpiness Out of You, but Gently
